DOC.criteria: Two group subject ( one different criterion ) : 1 . Oocyte donor Age 18 34 year Normal caryotype Normal psychological test Presence hereditary disease Betathalassemia Cystic fibrosis Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) , Hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) 2 .
